house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1999 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace, skylights.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Dining/Living Combo,Dishwasher, Garage Door Opener, Skylights, Wet Bar
